title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 58, subpt. 58-2 - Blood Banks and Laboratories Performing Immunohematology Testing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 58, subpt. 58-2 - Blood Banks and Laboratories Performing Immunohematology Testing

§ 58-2.7 - Immunohematology testing

§ 58-2.10 - Required records and confidentiality

§ 58-2.15 - Collection of blood components by apheresis
§ 58-2.16 - Required standards for transfusions

§ 58-2.19 - Records to be kept when derivatives are infused

§ 58-2.22 - [Repealed]

§ 58-2.26 - Exceptions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 58, subpt. 58-2

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§3121(5), 3124

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
